title: intha thaamasamaithE
sahitya:
inta tAmasamaitE entani sairintu Emi cEyudu rAma



anupallavi



kantu janaka nannuvinta jEsitE ninnUranta navvarA sItAkAnta nanu karuNimpa



caraNam 1



rAjIvalOcana rAjitO rAvEmirA jIvanamu nIvErA jImUtAbhatanO

     rAjIvAsana janaka rAjillu raghuvamsha rAjarAja nIvErA jIvAdhAra



caraNam 2



sundaramUrti nAyandu daya rAdu nEnendu bOdura nIyandu cittamugAni

     endunnAvO rAkendu shEkharanuta nI kenda anumAna mindu vadana



caraNam 3



gauravamEdi shrngAravAridhE brOvagarAdA pAvanu gArAdA muni hrdayA-

     gAra pratyakSamu gArAdA ika muddugAra tyAgarAjuni gAravimpa
